titles.title: Hast Thou Not One Word For Me (familiar easy)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lord hast Thou not one word for me To bind my soul more close to Thee That ev'ry evil I may flee One word O Lord One word from Thee{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}One word to show how weak am I When in my strength alone I try In vain I toil in vain I sigh One word O Lord One word from Thee{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}One word to show how near Thou art For Thou dost dwell within my heart And of Thy life I share a part One word O Lord One word from Thee{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}One word of power oh let me hear Above the heart's most anxious fear Thy still small voice yet deep and clear One word O Lord One word from Thee{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}One word of final triumph Lord Sweet hope Thy promises afford To dwell with Thee in sweet accord One word O Lord One word from Thee{/lang-eng}
